newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Sao Paulo industrial activity up 0.8 pct in May.
newsitem.headline: Sao Paulo industrial activity up 0.8 pct in May.

text.p: Sao Paulo state's industrial activity rose 0.8 percent in May compared with May 1996, the Sao Paulo state industries Federation (Fiesp) said in a statement.
However, May industrial activity fell 9.3 percent when compared with April 1997.
April industrial activity was inflated this year due to the fact that the Easter holidays fell in March, Fiesp said.
Industrial sales in May rose 5.4 percent from the same month in 1996 but dropped 10.1 percent from April, it said.
